name: Qiqirn
description: The Qiqirn is a small, agile monstrosity known for its stealth, with a keen sense of smell and a notable presence on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear through vocalizations and its necrotic damage adds psychological depth to its combat capabilities.
goals: The Qiqirn typically seeks to surprise and outmaneuver its foes, using stealth and fear to gain the upper hand.
relations: It is often found in the company of other cunning monsters and can be seen working alongside creatures that prefer ambush tactics.
environment: The Qiqirn can thrive in forests, swamps, or any area where it can easily hide and use its agility.
strengths: High Dexterity and stealth capabilities allow it to remain hidden and strike effectively from the shadows.
weaknesses: Its low intelligence makes it vulnerable to strategic manipulation and mental challenges.
attacks: The Qiqirn can deliver a biting attack that deals piercing and necrotic damage, with the potential to knock foes prone.
most_powerful_ability: Horrifying Wail instills fear in opponents when it takes damage, providing a defense mechanism that disrupts its enemies.
senses: It has keen senses due to its Keen Smell ability, giving it an advantage on smell-related perception checks.
skills: Skilled in perception and stealth, enhancing its ability to avoid detection and notice threats.
additional_information: Can be frightened by intimidation if it fails a Wisdom saving throw.
Uses a unique Spirit-infused Yip to inflict necrotic damage.
